casebody.data:
KING
v.
ALBEMARLE HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, et al. 382PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2017 Amberley G. Hammer, Attorney at Law, for King, Desiree, et al. Wayne M. Mansulla, Attorney at Law, for D.K. (Minor), et al. Samuel G. Thompson, Attorney at Law, Robert E. Desmond, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Northeastern OB/GYN, LTD, et al. Charles E. Simpson, Jr., Attorney at Law, New Bern, Jay C. Salsman, Attorney at Law, for Albemarle Hospital Authority, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of June 2017 by Wayne M. Mansulla for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of June 2017."
